title: Smoked roasted loin of venison with beetroot tarte tatin
description: A savoury take on a classic tarte tatin makes a dazzling accompaniment to home-smoked venison. For this recipe you will need a home smoker or a barbecue.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 pieces cooked whole baby beetroot, halved
500g/1lb 2oz ready-made all butter puff pastry, rolled to 5mm/¼in thick
